extendedInfo.description: If you've already tried all other similar programs, I assure you this is the best. It has all the useful features to keep your personal finances, some of them you will not find in any other program. Below is short description of the most important of them.REAL recurring transactions. Something that not only simply recalls the payments, but also allows you to plan incomes and expenses, and forecast your financial situation. The program also includes these transactions in reports and budgets.ADVANCED, interactive reports. It is possible to analyze any data, broken down into categories, projects, payees, currency, etc. Each item of the report can be further analyzed drill down it on the other ingredients, make a monthly analysis, or simply view the transactions made up for it.SAFE data backup. Automatically created as often as you want. The program will take care about the safety of your data. Additionally, data can be password protected. The program also has support for Dropbox.FULL support for multiple currencies. The program always show you the sum value of your assets, taking into account the most recent exchange rate. The reports always show the real value in your default currency, regardless of transaction currency. Information broken down by currency is an option, not a limitation.Other examples of functions:- mechanism of budgets,- split transactions included in all program function,- suggests a categories based on previously transactions (based on the payee or memo),- account balance allows to predict your financial situation,- securing access to the program with to unlock pattern,- mechanism to reconcile accounts,- import / export in CSV format (only in PRO version)- import / export in QIF format,- Multi Window support (on some Samsung phones),- and many, many others.The program includes advertising. You can buy the PRO version:- reminders about scheduled transactions in the notification area- import / export in CSV format- no adsRequired permission: - write to the card - needed to backup data and exports, - full access to the Internet - required by the Dropbox and the ads.AppEggs.com review:"Have trouble to deal with your finances? Here the wonderful finance app named Cash Droid for Android comes to help you keep personal finances. Since you have this app, you will never worry about your personal finance issues." http://www.appeggs.com/apps/com.financial.cashdroid.ads,3930.html

reviews.title: Awesome stuff!!!
reviews.comment: Exactly what I wanted and does everything I need!! I have a request tho, would be great if the credit card option had a \"balance\" and \"avaliable balance\" and also an overdraft function on the bank accounts. Ill buy the pro version if this could be added.
reviews.author: Gerrie Van Dyk

reviews.title: Just installllllllll
reviews.comment: This is one of the top app for managing accounts of ur cash and bank balance. I have checked around 50+ app before keeping this. Spend some time and make changes to accounts add payee list the way u want then it works perfectly fine......100 stars from me for this app....Good job developpers\302\241\302\241\302\241
reviews.author: Sapna Megharaj

reviews.title: Just the one I was looking for
reviews.comment: I already had this on my kindle fire.. I love it.. simple and easy-to-use.. closest thing to a checkbook register I could find.. been using it about a year now.. love it!!!
reviews.author: Amanda Pardee

reviews.title: Useful
reviews.comment: Simple and user-friendly. As a student, I find it easy to keep track of my spendings.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good effort.
reviews.comment: This app has a simple UI and good features.. but I was unable to track both recurring and one-time transactions easily.
reviews.author: Ahmed Abdel Aziz

reviews.title: Using it almost every day
reviews.comment: I cannot begin to tell you how useful this app is for me. It has helped me plan my trips, and day to day expenses.
reviews.author: Mando Padilla

reviews.title: Clean but unclear report
reviews.comment: Report only show % and balance which is almost useless, no sane setting in report, FC when creating transfer.
reviews.author: Minh NN

reviews.title: GOOD APP
reviews.comment: Its very useful for me....
reviews.author: Moch Iszar

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: It will provide balances in all ur accounts.u can plan ur expenditures as per the balances.very very useful apps.using since 2years.
reviews.author: NAKKA RAVIKUMAR

reviews.title: Liked it until.....
reviews.comment: About a weeks ago. After entering a new transaction when you hit save, it crashes.... EVERY FREAKING TIME!!!!!!!!!! So annoying. Used to love this app.... now i am looking for another app to manage my money.
reviews.author: Elizabeth Summers

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Used everyday
reviews.author: Budi Haryanto

reviews.title: Cool app
reviews.comment: Nice and easy app
reviews.author: Ss Ssa

reviews.title: Perfect!
reviews.comment: This app is great I use it daily four all my finances/budgeting/ expense tracking.
reviews.author: Michael Morrison

reviews.title: Rubbish
reviews.comment: So many major bugs
reviews.author: Bart Rybka

reviews.title: LLC SUMMARY
reviews.comment: Learning to acord by colours
reviews.author: Sanjeev Dhiman

reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
reviews.comment: I wanted an app that would accept Quicken data and this does.  I had some problems at first but got a quick and helpful response to my request for support.  Quite amazing that such a good app is free. I can\'t understand why it doesn\'t feature on lists of the best finance apps.
reviews.author: Anne Celnick

reviews.title: I love it!
reviews.comment: I haven\'t found any other app that can equal this one\'s functionality. Request though... I hope the widget would be updated to a more Holo design. Thanks! :-D
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No negative opening balances
reviews.comment: Huge oversight when i cant enter a negative balance on a credit card when creating the account.  Only allowed are numbers and dot no - to indicate neg balance.
reviews.author: Avice Dunn

reviews.title: Nearly perfect
reviews.comment: This is the best finance app I have used so far. It\'s feature-packed and with a decent UI. Good job devs!
reviews.author: Paula Godoy

reviews.title: No export in the free version
reviews.comment: I was looking for a very simple applications allowing me to enter expenses and than exporting this to a csv. Cash Droid can do much more but does not fulfill my requirements as the export is not allowed with the free version.
reviews.author: Pierre Debar
